text: Ðis is ðæt landgemære to sciren ac.
Ærest of wines brycge ondlang lecc to ðæs preostes mædwe into feccan ham.
Onlang ðæs broces ðæt hit cymeð to ipples berhge.
And swa eal abutan ðæt hit cymð eft in ðone ilcan brocc.
And swa æfter ðam broce to wahgenes gemære.
Of wahgenes gemære ðæt hit cyme to ðære pirian.
And of ðære pirian to ðam walle ðe is in ðam holan wege.
And of ðam walle wahgenes gemæres eft into wines brycge.
